attributes.action: Re think Censoship laws around multi media entertainment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We need to have a SERIOUS and scientific debate about the use and effects of games across the multi media spectrum. Yes there should be censorship (to a certain degree) but is it not time that we looked at the long term effect (or lack of) on society?
If films, alcohol, fireworks, drugs, solvents, music and tobacco can be properly regulated on who they are sold to why not games?
Re-Think the gaming industry don't stiffle it in it's infancy!
